ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Greetings fellow Questers
ygData.msgSnippet: With my beastlord I did lvls 14- 16 in the throneroom in Crushbone, 16 - 25 in PC hunting Recondite bandits, 25 -30 in South Karana hunting avaiks and Tesch
ygData.messageBody:
With my beastlord I did lvls 14- 16 in the throneroom in Crushbone, 16 - 25 in PC hunting Recondite bandits, 25 -30 in South Karana hunting avaiks and Tesch Mas gnolls. 30 - 35 in either FM or HHK basement, 35-40 in the Overthere, 40 -44 in Great Divide XP wasn't real great but built up my faction for the Prayer shawl quests and Thurg armor quests 44- 50 in the DLs and KC and have been doing POJ and Kael Drakkel up to my current level up 53.
 Woradin SwyftClaw  53 Beastlord
----- Original Message -----
From: Clay
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Wednesday, April 23, 2003 11:30 AM
Subject: [EverQuest] Greetings fellow Questers

I have mostly played Shamans and have had a blast. Thanks to the
others here I have been able to advance my Shaman into the high 20s.

I now have a problem and again ask for some help...I am trying a Bar.
Beastlord.

I now need to find a place to move on to and advance in levels, with
my shaman I found I "ran in to a wall" at 15th level and it was like
pulling teeth to make 16th , 17 and 18th levels. I want of avoid this
with my BL.

I have made it to 15th level (thanks to Mammoth calfs and wrath orc
wristbands) I have all my spells for 15th level, most of my armor is
magic or BL newbee Quest armor. I have the Newbee Claw,and a harpoon
I could use a better hth weapon but by all acounts I am doing good.

Where does a 15th level Bar. Beastlord hunt to make levels in good
time?

I thank you and will keep you all informed on how I do.

Wolff




Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com
